character.knight.name: Sparkle Knight
character.knight.desc: A balanced warrior with shining armor.
character.rogue.name: Shadow Ninja
character.rogue.desc: A speedy fighter who strikes from the shadows.
character.mage.name: Arcane Mage
character.mage.desc: Master of blue magic and protective auras.
character.cleric.name: Sun Priest
character.cleric.desc: Heals wounds and purges evil with holy light.
character.huntress.name: Leaf Ranger
character.huntress.desc: A forest guardian who never misses a shot.
character.warlock.name: Moon Warlock
map.forest.name: Haunted Forest
map.forest.desc: A dark and sprawling forest teeming with common beasts.
map.crypt.name: Cursed Crypt
map.crypt.desc: A desolate crypt where durable and relentless undead await.
enemy.slime.name: Slime
enemy.slime.desc: A weak, jelly-like creature. It bounces towards you slowly.
enemy.spider.name: Spider
enemy.spider.desc: A fast and agile arachnid that swarms in groups.
enemy.bat.name: Bat
enemy.bat.desc: A fast-flying creature of the night. Hard to hit but fragile.
enemy.mushroom.name: Mushroom
enemy.mushroom.desc: A tough fungal creature. It moves slowly but is hard to kill.
enemy.ghost.name: Ghost
enemy.ghost.desc: A spectral entity that floats through obstacles to haunt you.
enemy.golem.name: Golem
enemy.golem.desc: A massive construct of stone. High health and deadly damage.
enemy.skeleton.name: Skeleton
enemy.skeleton.desc: The reanimated bones of a fallen warrior. Relentless.
upgrade.iceshard.1: Fires an additional shard in the opposite direction.
upgrade.iceshard.3: Fires shards in a cross pattern (forward, back, sides).
upgrade.iceshard.8: Fires shards in all eight directions.
upgrade.katana.7: MASTER SWORDSMAN! Slashing in all directions.
